name: Rise up
description:
Rise up is an indie arcade game that has everything to bring an enjoyable videogame experience to his players.
The goal of "Rise up" is to reach the maximum possible height without losing, in this game, you need to fall from the building to lose, you can fall through the holes in the walls of the building.
The building structure is generated randomly, so every game will be different from the previous game.
Enjoyable gameplay and lots of fun will be achieved while playing

What to expect:

-Easy to understand game, making it perfect for all ages and tastes.

-Challenging gameplay, needed of reflexes, fast thinking and strategy to ascend on the building.

-Historical best score that will be stored on the game.

-Building generated randomly, that will bring the players a different videogame experience in every game.

-Enjoyable and fun gameplay.

-Good sound and music.


How to play:

-You just need your mouse to navigate throgh menus and to play.
